House, M.D.

(a Titles &
Air Dates Guide)

by this TVRage editor

Last updated:
Tue, 5 Oct 2010 11:00
aired from: Nov 2004
to: ___ ____		 110+ eps Fox (US) 60 min
  • Hugh Laurie as Dr. Gregory House
  • Lisa Edelstein as Dr. Lisa Cuddy
  • Omar Epps as Dr. Eric Foreman
  • Robert Sean Leonard as Dr. James Wilson
  • Jennifer Morrison as Dr. Allison Cameron [ 1-6 ]
  • Jesse Spencer as Dr. Robert Chase
  • Olivia Wilde as Dr. Remy 'Thirteen' Hadley [ 4- ]
  • Kal Penn as Dr. Lawrence Kutner [ 4- ]
  • Peter Jacobson as Dr. Chris Taub [ 4- ]

Medical puzzles are solved by a brilliant but misanthropic diagnostician and his team.
